entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
